articles.author: Robert Pearlman
articles.title: ‘Not that into peace doves’: The Apollo-Soyuz patch NASA rejected - Ars Technica
articles.description: Space artist Paul Calle thought he had represented the overall mission for the Apollo-Soyuz Test Project (ASTP). NASA disapproved.
